19.07.2015: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, but only saps today of its strength.
20.07.2015: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer.
21.07.2015: All happiness depends on courage and work.
22.07.2015: You've got to get obsessed and stay on obsessed.
23.07.2015: Real generosity towards the future lies in giving all to the present.
24.07.2015: Whatever you are meant to do, do it now. The conditions are always impossible.
25.07.2015: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.
26.07.2015: An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field.
27.07.2015: Far and away, the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
28.07.2015: You have to fight through the bad days in order to earn the best days.
29.07.2015: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
30.07.2015: Not everyone will understand your journey, and that's fine. It's not their journey to make sense of, it's yours.
31.07.2015: Stay positive; stay fighting; stay brave; stay ambitious; stay focused; stay strong. Mentality is everything.
01.08.2015: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you, proving them wrong.
02.08.2015: The world better be ready to receive your talent.
03.08.2015: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
04.08.2015: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
05.08.2015: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
06.08.2015: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
07.08.2015: We improve ourselves by victory over our self. There must be contests, and you must win.
08.08.2015: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.
09.08.2015: Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
10.08.2015: No one can construct for you the bridge which precisely you must cross the stream of life, no one but you yourself alone.
11.08.2015: Nothing great in the world was accomplished without passion.
12.08.2015: There is no secret to success except hard work.
13.08.2015: Energy rightly applied and directed will accomplish anything.
14.08.2015: What matters most is how well you walk through the fire.
